name: Groundhog Day (buysnoah)
description:
My first game with love2d

^Widehog (maybe I'll add a new gamemode featuring him at some point 😱😳)

That's all. What did you expect, my life story? It's a space invader knock off where you are a cloud who shoots snowballs at a groundhog because he's the reason winter is ending.

Ignore the font ingame, I know its blurry, it's "temporary"
